attributes.action: bring MPs salaries into the proposed three year public service pay proposal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs, as public servants, should be role models for the rest of the public servants who are in line to be affected by the PMs recent public service pay announcement.

They should be locked into the same three year pay award agreement as the other public servants e.g. police, nurses, firefighters, etc.

It is a disgrace that they are forcing pay award deals on public servants but not many of them are complaining about the 2.8% award being proposed for them.

It is time for them to walk the talk.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
